name: Not Real Islands
description:
Not Real Islands

Game by:

Doug Winegarden @DougDevs

Special Thanks:

Jake Kargl

Zachary Tenorio - additional 3D models

Controls:

  • Left click to move
  • F to start or stop fishing
  • While fishing:
    • Right click to cast the rod in the direction of your cursor
    • Right click to cancel your cast, or wait for a fish to bite.
    • Once a fish is hooked, rapidly click right click to reel in
    • Once a fish is caught, right click once to drop the fish or walk around with it on the hook.

Have fun and try to collect all 5 fish!

Tools & Assets used:

  • Unity Game Engine
  • Coral Fish 5 by CGSoul
  • Character Movement Fundamentals by Jan Ott
  • Toon Water URP by Pitor T.
  • Free Low Poly Desert Pack by 23 Space Robots and Counting
  • Boats - PolyPack by Alstra Infinite
